translations: 以果实或干酪为馅而烤成的点心

sentences.sentence: Zeke: I love to bake! Strudels, scones, even apple pandowdy.
sentences.translation: 我喜欢烤点心啊。水果馅饼，小饼干，连苹果布丁我都会。

sentences.sentence: Strudels are usually made with high-gluten flour to increase the malleability of the dough.
sentences.translation: 馅卷饼通常是用高筋面粉，以增加面团的延展性。
